name: EufySecurity
0:
”Alexa, show me the front door.”
”Alexa, show the backyard camera.”
”Alexa, show me the garage camera.”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Eufy Security is now supporting Alexa! 
With the EufySecurity Skill, you can activate your Eufy Security cameras and watch live by saying Alexa voice commands. 

To get started, please follow below steps:
1. Setup the Eufy Security camera and make sure they’re working fine on the App.
2. In the Alexa app, search for "EufySecurity" Skill. Enable the skill to link your Eufy Security account with your Alexa account.
3. Now try out some commands. Use the name of the camera that you created when you set up the system. For example:

- “Alexa, show the garage camera.“
- “Alexa, hide the living room camera.”
- “Alexa, go home.”
- “Alexa, stop.”

The compatible Amazon Alexa devices are:
- Echo Show
- Echo Spot
- Fire Tablets Generation 7th & above
- All generations of Fire TV
- Only second generations of Fire TV stick
- Fire TV Edition smart TVs
